title: Lauryn Hill to headline Famously Hot New Year
text:
Lauryn Hill to headline Famously Hot New Year Five-time Grammy winner Lauryn Hill will headline Columbia’s New Year’s Eve celebration Famously Hot New Year 2014-2015. Photo by Jeff Blake Jeff Blake Jeff Blake 1 of 2 
Lauryn Hill will headline Columbia’s Famously Hot New Year on Dec. 31, city officials announced Thursday.  ; 
Hip-hop singer Hill is a five-time Grammy winner known for her hits “Do Wop (That Thing),” “Ex-Factor,” “Everything is Everything” and “To Zion.” 
Three South Carolina bands will open for Hill – Charleston’s vintage rock group Dead 27s, Columbia’s folk-hop band Colorblind and Charleston alt-country band Susto. 
Now its fifth year, Famously Hot New Year is South Carolina’s largest New Year’s Eve celebration. Last year’s event drew a crowd of 28,000. 
Past years’ performers have included Rock and Roll Hall of Famer George Clinton, The Wallflowers, Kool & the Gang, ZZ Ward and The O’Jays. 
Famously Hot New Year is a free event that will be held this year from 6:30 p.m. to 12:30 a.m. Dec. 31 at Main and Gervais streets in downtown Columbia. There will be a fireworks show at midnight. 
For more information, visit http://www.famouslyhotnewyear.com/  ;
